content:
Hmm? I'm observing our surroundings.
Even places that seem plain and ordinary
might hide something... special.

Maybe I shouldn't have brought this up with you,
but don't worry, our world bubble is still perfectly safe.

In the Academia's library, vast as the deep sea,
there are only a dozen or so research materials about the mysterious machinery,
yet their use isn't rare at all - how mysterious, yeep~ (thinking)

The Qijie is a multi-purpose tool invented by the Qianfeng Association to lighten their Backpack load during exploration.
At least, that's what the records in the Academia say.

Many brilliant inventions
were born from the urgent need to be lazy.
(Smiling)
